title: Google\Cloud\Video\Transcoder\V1\AudioStream\AudioMapping
name: AudioMapping
description:
The mapping for the Job.edit_list atoms with audio EditAtom.inputs.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.video.transcoder.v1.AudioStream.AudioMapping

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.atom_key
params.description: Required. The EditAtom.key that references the atom with audio inputs in the Job.edit_list.

params.name: data.input_key
params.description: Required. The Input.key that identifies the input file.

params.name: data.input_track
params.description: Required. The zero-based index of the track in the input file.

params.name: data.input_channel
params.description: Required. The zero-based index of the channel in the input audio stream.

params.name: data.output_channel
params.description: Required. The zero-based index of the channel in the output audio stream.

params.name: data.gain_db
params.description: Audio volume control in dB. Negative values decrease volume, positive values increase. The default is 0.
